dict.string: Today is 14 days, which are two weeks, of the Omer.
Hoy es catorce días, que son dos semanas del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est quatorze jours, qui sont deux semaines du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ЧЕТЫРНАДЦАТЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ДВЕ НЕДЕЛИ ОМЕРА
הַיּוֹם אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר יוֹם שֶׁהֵם שְׁנֵי שָׁבוּעוֹת לָעֽוֹמֶר

Discipline, like love, must enhance personal dignity (see Week One, Day Seven). Discipline that demoralizes a person will backfire. Healthy discipline should bolster self-esteem and help elicit the best in a person, cultivating his sovereignty. This expression of discipline does not compromise the discipline; on the contrary it fosters and enhances it.
When disciplining your child or student, foster his self-respect.
Does my discipline cripple the human spirit?
Does it weaken or strengthen me and others?
